entry.title: Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (5)
entry.content:
Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (5)20150831
I played today for about an hour and went through most of Old
Yharnum. I unlocked two short-cuts and now I can get down to the
bottom faster without having to go through the gatling gun guy.

Total time: 9:23

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 15 - Look Out for Launch
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 15 - Look Out for Launch20150831

an explanation of why she changes when she sneezes.

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 16 - Find That Stone!
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 16 - Find That Stone!20150831
Krillin is such a punk. And I don't understand why there was any
value in searching for the stone and having a competition about
it.

entry.title: Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (4)
entry.content:
Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (4)20150829
I played for a bit and explored most of the Cathedral Ward and
made my way to Old Yharnam. The game is very nerve-wracking. The
old town is very strangely organized and I get bad performance
from the engine while walking around. I've done quite a bit of
upgrading of all my stuff. I like the speed of the Kirkhammer when
it is not in hammer mode.

Total time: 8:34
  • Video Games
  • Bloodborne
  • PS4
  • 2015

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 8 - The Kamehameha Wave
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 8 - The Kamehameha Wave20150828
It is very silly that the Bansho fan was carelessly thrown
out. I'm surprised that Chichi and the Ox King are just gone from
the story. I like that Goku does a baby wave on the first try.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 9 - Boss Rabbit's Magic Touch20150828
What a weird power the boss has! And what a weird punishment to
be forced to live on the moon and make marshmallows!

entry.title: Movie: Project Almanac, starring Jonny Weston (2015)
entry.content:
Movie: Project Almanac, starring Jonny Weston (2015)20150828
I did not have big expectations for this movie, but was very
impressed and loved the story. I thought the acting and personal
interest was pretty cool, as did I like the sciency side of it.
  • Movies
  • 2015

entry.title: Book: Storm Front, by Jim Butcher (2000) (2)
entry.content:
Book: Storm Front, by Jim Butcher (2000) (2)20150828
This was a really cool book. I think what I liked the best was that
magic was presented as very messy and uncontrollable, but Dresden
was presented as such a great expert that he was a master of that
power. I thought the fights at the end were very exciting and
worked really well. I'm excited to read more of the series.
  • Books
  • 2000

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 4 - Oolong the Terrible
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 4 - Oolong the Terrible20150825
This is such a silly episode. I like that it ends up being a
goofy pig. It is also cute that Goku doesn't actually hurt people
if he doesn't have to, but just chases Oolong.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 5 - Yamcha the Desert Bandit
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 5 - Yamcha the Desert Bandit20150825
It's very strange that Oolong is suddenly in the group. He
provides another comic relief character that is silly in a
different way from Bulma and Goku. Yamcha is interesting because
he's the first one that can actually hurt Goku and where Goku
needs to fight a bit.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 6 - Keep an Eye on the Dragon Balls
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 6 - Keep an Eye on the Dragon Balls20150825
Yamcha's reaction to the Bulma is crazy and the fan-service of
Bulma dressing like a bunny girl is really ridiculous. At this
point I noticed that Oolong looks like Mao and is kind of
pathetic.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 7 - The Ox King on Fire Mountain
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 7 - The Ox King on Fire Mountain20150825
It's so funny again that Goku is super kind to the Ox King and
this causes him to actually realize that they should be
friends. It's also funny that Roshi is coming back into the story
and that there was always a connection between Goku and Roshi but
it didn't come up before. I wonder if Goku is actually vulnerable
in his tail, or if he just doesn't like it being touched.

Watching Dragon Ball each morning makes me feel like I'm in
elementary school again. When I was young, I would watch it each
morning while eating breakfast before going out to the bus.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (3)
entry.content:
Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (3)20150824
I played for a while and beat Father Gascione. I cheesed him by
getting him stuck on the stairs. I did a little bit of grinding
after that so I could afford the key and the Kirkhammer. The
Kirkhammer feels like a bad purchase because it isn't as strong as
what I have already, but I suppose it will be stronger if I
upgrade it as much as the axe I already have. I explored the next
area a little bit, but not enough to get anywhere really.

Total time: 7:21
  • Video Games
  • Bloodborne
  • PS4
  • 2015

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 1 - The Secret of the Dragon Balls
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 1 - Episode 1 - The Secret of the Dragon Balls20150824
I like the naivety of Goku and how quickly the story starts. I
like the weird technology of the world they live in.
